column4: hi all, how can I make urxvt's color exactly like gnome-terminal's?
change it in ~/.Xdefaults, then run xrdb ~/.Xdefaults
exactly. But I can't seem to find the correct color code and pass it to ~/.Xdefaults as 'URxvt*background: rgba:xxxx/xxxx/xxxx/xxxx
if you really can't find it, just take a screenshot and sample it
